title: Falter logo - Univers {Stephen}
content:
hi there,   
   
i hope one of you specialists can help me identifying a font.   
   
please take a look at [http://www.falter.at/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100909055338/http:/www.falter.at/)   
   
what type did they use for their "logo" (Falter)?   
   
thanks in advance,   
oliver
author: anonymous
